## Events.ViewportChange.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `ViewportChange` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(opt_top?: number, opt_left?: number, opt_scale?: number, opt_workspaceId?: string, opt_oldScale?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_top | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Top-edge of the visible portion of the workspace, relative to the workspace origin. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_left | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Left-edge of the visible portion of the workspace relative to the workspace origin. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_scale | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The scale of the workspace. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_workspaceId | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The workspace identifier for this event. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_oldScale | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The old scale of the workspace. Undefined for a blank event. |
